dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’m really worried about this, I hope it can be fixed.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Don’t worry, Ms. Greene. We’ll get this sorted out.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’ve been losing sleep over this.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand, and I’m here to help you through it.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Please tell me it’s not too late.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Not at all. We can resolve this right away.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay… what do I need to do?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’ll walk you through each step, it’s easy.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I’m nervous I’ll mess something up.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You won’t. I’m here to guide you the whole way.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright… go ahead.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Let’s start by verifying your identity.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay. What information do you need?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Your account number and the last 4 of your SSN, please.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright, here they are.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you. Let me pull up your account now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Do you see the problem on your end?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I do. Give me just a moment to investigate.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Please hurry…

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Of course, I’m working as fast as possible.
